QuestData.Title: Message to Hellscream
QuestData.Description: <Barthus tears out the last page and rolls it up.>$B$BTake this to Hellscream at once! In the meantime, I'm going to send a team to scout out the farms.$B$BBe sure to tell Hellscream that we're going to need reinforcements.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Barthus's Note to Garrosh Hellscream at Warsong Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is the meaning of this interruption? Do not burden me with nonsense!
QuestData.RewardText: <Hellscream reads the journal entry.>$B$BIs that all?
